org.earthspecialforces.dragonpower.game

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.earthspecialforces.dragonpower.game.Constants

  • public abstract class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a certain number of field properties that remain constant throughout the execution of the game
